author: sunnysidedj_42398
content: Any further comments from others? Otherwise, I will take the new names into implementation!

author: sibkatya
content: My proposal is `execution_engine_getblobsV2_requested_total`

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: I don't think we should prefix ourselves with the client type that we belong to. This should be done by the ingestion engine

author: sunnysidedj_42398
content: Yeah, I've been looking at the prefixes with existing metrics and they seem to be added outside of client code.

author: sunnysidedj_42398
content: But for the definition the name should be prefixed with `execution`

content: Okay üëç
